description: Sublattices of index n in generic 7-dimensional lattice.
references: M. Baake, "Solution of coincidence problem...", in R. V. Moody, ed., Math. of Long-Range Aperiodic Order, Kluwer 1997, pp. 9-44.
links: Index entries for sequences related to sublattices
formula: f(Q, n)=Sum d*f(Q-1, d), d|n; here Q=7.Multiplicative with a(p^e) = product (p^(e+k)-1)/(p^k-1), k=1..6
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
